title: What is the name of this song in League I love it!?
body:
At the end of this video in the patch rundown, what is the song playing!? I love it!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2E6fOjn5ZXU

replies.body: Hi there! Sorry this took so long to find out - but after some digging, the song doesn't really have a title. It is an edit of sorts of the new Summoners Rift Music. which is now in game! So if you like the music in the patch rundown - you'll love the new Summoners Rift music as well :)

> Darude Sandstorm

That's a techno song on YouTube, I don't hear any flutes o.O Are you sure?

> > Darude Sandstorm
> 
> That's a techno song on YouTube, I don't hear any flutes o.O Are you sure?

Sir Sir Sir it is a internet joke how do you no understand

The Darude Sandstorm joke is for when the name of the song being requested is in the description, credits, or annotations - it's basically a prank directed against people too lazy to look for themselves.

...So, not applicable here.

> > > Darude Sandstorm
> > 
> > That's a techno song on YouTube, I don't hear any flutes o.O Are you sure?
> 
> Sir Sir Sir it is a internet joke how do you no understand

I just wanted the name of the song... not a joke :(
Sounds like a variation of the new Summoner's Rift theme.
